app_footer_responsibility: This tool is intended for educational and analytical purposes. The analysis is generated by an AI and may not always be perfectly accurate or complete. The user is responsible for all Google Gemini API costs.
info_enter_text_to_analyze: Enter some text above and click "Analyze" to see the AI's insights. You can also use the context menu (select text and right click) or the keyboard shortcuts (select text and press Alt/⌥+Shift+A) to analyze text.
info_uncover_patterns: HootSpot AI will help you uncover hidden psychological and rhetorical patterns.
config_api_key_info: Your Google Gemini API Key is required to use HootSpot AI. It is stored locally in your browser and never sent to our servers. You are responsible for any costs associated with its use.
config_get_api_key: Get your API Key from Google AI Studio
config_openrouter_api_key_info: Your OpenRouter API Key is required to use HootSpot AI. It is stored locally in your browser and never sent to our servers. You are responsible for any costs associated with its use.
config_local_server_info: Run a local inference server in LM Studio and enter the details here.
config_max_chars_info: Helps prevent accidentally analyzing very large texts.
config_status_unsaved: You have unsaved changes. Analysis is disabled until you save.
analyzer_no_api_key_warning: Please complete your configuration in the settings above to enable analysis.
report_no_patterns_detected: No manipulative patterns were detected in the provided text.
error_api_key_test_failed_generic: API Key test failed. Check console for details.
error_local_server_config_missing: Local server URL and Model Name must be configured.
error_local_server_connection: Could not connect to local server at {url}. Ensure the server is running and the URL is correct.
error_local_model_not_loaded: The model '{model}' might not be loaded.
error_safety_block: The request was blocked due to safety concerns from the API. Try modifying the input text.
error_unexpected_json_structure: Received an unexpected JSON structure from the API.
error_quota_exhausted: API Quota Error: {message} This can happen if you are using a free-tier key for a model that requires a paid plan, or if you've exceeded the requests-per-minute limit. Please check your Google AI Studio billing status and usage limits.
test_query_returned_empty: Test query returned empty or invalid response.
lang_manager_info: Enter a two-letter language code (e.g., 'it' for Italian). The AI will translate the UI, and the code will be used as the display name.
lang_manager_error_no_key: A valid configuration for the current provider must be saved to translate a new language.
lang_manager_error_generic: An unknown error occurred during translation.
lang_manager_error_safety: The translation request was blocked due to safety concerns.
lang_manager_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the '{langName}' language? This action cannot be undone.
error_invalid_json_file: Invalid or corrupted HootSpot JSON file.
rebuttal_description: Use the analysis to generate a direct rebuttal (experimental)
error_provider_not_configured: The current service provider is not configured.
error_local_model_mismatch: Model Mismatch: Server responded with '{actual}' instead of the requested '{requested}'. Please ensure the correct model is loaded.
error_local_model_not_loaded_exact: Model Not Found: The server could not find the model '{model}'. Please ensure it is loaded.
config_ollama_info: Run Ollama locally and enter the server details here. Make sure the model you want to use is pulled and available.
